column2: "I've been hearing a lot about you. Everyone says how hard you've been working. Even Zeno seems really impressed."
"I'd like to see how you're doing first-hand, to make sure you're not putting yourself in danger. That's why I'd like you to come along with me."
"To do what? Oh, it's a client order. Just a little test of your capabilities."
"But don't worry, I'll be right there with you!"
"Hey, why'd you just make that face when I said I'd be with you? Tsk, how rude! Anyway. Hurry up, we're leaving now!"

"<yellow>*This client order on which you will have Echo accompany you will be easier to complete if you set a password in the \"Party Info\" menu and select the \"Restrict other parties in Multi-Party Areas\" option when accepting it.<c>"
